title: Crack the Hashed Password
description: A challenge focusing on exploiting weak password storage using hashcat.
hints: MD5 hashes can be cracked using tools like hashcat.
The password is a common word followed by numbers.
Use a wordlist and hashcat to crack the hash.
learningObjectives: Understand the risks of unsalted hash usage.
Learn to identify weak hash storage practices.
Practice using hashcat for cracking hashed passwords.
